properties.name: component
properties.description: An alias for the [template] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Specifies whether the button is disabled.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name used to identify a built-in button.

properties.name: render
properties.description: An alias for the [template] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

Events.name: onClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when the button is clicked or tapped.
